Packages
com.hippikon.io Contains utility I/O methods used to support the Hippikon pacakge, mainly regarding loading XML and Java property files.
com.hippikon.security Hippikon is a powerful authorization API that was developed for enterprise software applications and is now provided free under Version 2.1 of the GNU LGPL.
com.hippikon.security.crypto Contains utility classes to handle common encryption and decryption operations.

 

Hippikon is a powerful authorization API and SDK for enforcing complex user authorization rules for java applications. The authorization engine is driven by an XML configuration file (static rules) and a runtime callback mechanism (dynamic object rules) that provides permission inheritance, permission overrides, object hierachy rules and object instance state/behaviour.

Developers using the API should divert their attential to the com.hippikon.security package, specifically the PermissionSet, ProtectedResource and PermissionsFactory classes, which form the basis of the API.

The API is designed to be minimal, as easy to use as possible but with hooks that allow a power user to go deeper. A convenient UI tool is provided to read the XML configuration files in a more user friendly way; it has been used for quality assurance testers to better understand the security model.

All the code is licensed under Version 2.1 of the GNU LGPL.
